mdRecord.dcterms:title: Amputation and general surgical set
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inscription on case reads "Jos. B. Whitehead, MD." Set includes: mirror, grooved director, bullet forceps, catling, two finger knife, metacarpal saw with lifting back, amputating tenaculum, three scalpels, trocar and canula, cartilage knife, forceps, tourniquet, bone forceps, curved sequestrum forceps, Darling's chain hook, curved wire serrefins, surgeon's silk suture, and cannula.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Surgical instruments and apparatus
